classification.intended_installation_point: Main service entrance / primary distribution panel
classification.electrical_environment: High-energy commercial and industrial WYE systems

overview.positioning_headline: Two-stage primary surge protection for high-energy WYE systems
marketing_paragraphs: From the main distribution panel, the Mach 5 SPD System isolates sensitive downstream equipment from utility transients, lightning-induced surges, and internally generated electrical disturbances.
The system also isolates sub-distribution panels from internally generated surges, creating a complete grid of non-degrading surge protection across the electrical infrastructure.
By reducing surge stress, electrical noise, and power pollution, SurgePure Mach 5 products help extend equipment life, reduce downtime, and maximize long-term operational reliability.
overview.technical_positioning: The SurgePure Mach 5 SPD System is a primary level, two-stage, Dual-Mode surge protective device engineered for severe surge environments and large-capacity WYE electrical services.

bulleted_features: Your most vital primary level defense against today’s rolling blackouts and brownouts
Two-stage, Dual-Mode surge protection architecture for superior energy dissipation
Unique Dual-Mode fuse-links maintain safety of non-degrading, high-energy surge capacity
Designed for easy mounting and installation for fast response-time protection
Up to one million amps of solid, safe, single-element parallel surge protection
Surge Cushion technology reduces electrical noise and electrical pollution

safety_claims: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2
TVSS industry’s highest SCCR rating of 200kAIC

status_indicators.description: Lifetime green LED self-test protection status monitors for each phase

optional_features.name: Remote Aware
optional_features.description: Automatic remote alert when surge protection status changes
